topic.title: Reportable Malignancy List Entry - conformance rules

section.p: An order, arrangement, or significance in which the reportable Malignancy takes place.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] reportableMalignancy, where its type is Reportable Malignancy
An order, arrangement, or significance in which the reportable Malignancy takes place.

Contains exactly one [1..1] precedence with data type Integer
Provides an indication of whether the cancer treatment is primary, secondary, tertiary, etc.

Contains exactly one [1..1] precedence with data type Integer
Provides an indication of whether the cancer treatment is primary, secondary, tertiary, etc.

Contains exactly one [1..1] reportableMalignancy, where its type is Reportable Malignancy
An order, arrangement, or significance in which the reportable Malignancy takes place.
